page.title: 02The M90 Motorway
page.content: The main motorway is this area is the {M90}which runs north from{Edinburgh towards{Inverness. Roads from{Dunfermline}and exits from the motorway all converge to form a major junction on the left-hand side of{Inverkeithing. The motorway itself is the only major route from{Edinburgh}up to the east coast of Scotland, therefore it is always very congested - often there are long delays from people wanting to cross the{Forth Road Bridge. The motorway carries on up from the major junction mentioned earlier up through the farmland towards the junction at{Dunfermline.
